body_html: Thank you so much for your detailed explanation! However, what indeed puzzles me is how we can properly arrange ways of indexing blocks and threads. That is, how we can understand the way author use to arrange threads for feature maps with shape BHWC or BCHW.

body: Thank you so much for your detailed explanation! However, what indeed puzzles me is how we can properly arrange ways of indexing blocks and threads. That is, how we can understand the way author use to arrange threads for feature maps with shape BHWC or BCHW.
